attributes.action: 'We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to give
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to give

     consideration to a threat to airfields across the UK which

     might be considered "brownfield" sites for redevelopment as a

     result of a flawed new planning policy statement from the

     Department for Communities and Local Government (DCLG).'

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
